Container.Name: binhex-slskd
Container.Overview: A modern client-server application for the Soulseek file-sharing network.
Container.DonateText: If you appreciate my work, then please consider buying me a beer :D

Config.Name: Port: HTTP Web Interface
Config.Description: This is the HTTP Web UI port for the application.

Config.Name: Port: HTTPS Web Interface
Config.Description: This is the HTTPS Web UI port for the application.

Config.Name: Path: /config
Config.Description: This is the container path to your configuration files, e.g. databases, configuration files, logs etc.

Config.Name: Path: /media
Config.Description: This is the container path to your media files, e.g. movies, tv, music, pictures etc.

Config.Name: Path: /data
Config.Description: This is the container path to your downloaded files or user created content.

Config.Name: Variable: SLSK_USERNAME
Config.Description: Username for the Soulseek network.

Config.Name: Variable: SLSK_PASSWORD
Config.Description: Password for the Soulseek network.

Config.Name: Variable: SLSK_LISTEN_PORT
Config.Description: Port on which to listen for incoming connections.

Config.Name: Variable: SHARED_PATHS
Config.Description: Semi-colon separated list of container paths to shared files. !!WARNING!! Be careful not to share sensitive information.

Config.Name: Variable: INCOMPLETE_PATH
Config.Description: The container path where incomplete downloads are saved.

Config.Name: Variable: DOWNLOADS_PATH
Config.Description: The container path where downloaded files are saved.

Config.Name: Variable: UPLOAD_SPEED_LIMIT
Config.Description: Upload speed limit in bits/s.

Config.Name: Variable: DOWNLOAD_SPEED_LIMIT
Config.Description: Download speed limit in bits/s.

Config.Name: Variable: WEBUI_HTTP_PORT
Config.Description: HTTP port for web UI.

Config.Name: Variable: WEBUI_HTTPS_PORT
Config.Description: HTTPS port for web UI.

Config.Name: Variable: WEBUI_USERNAME
Config.Description: Username for web UI authentication.

Config.Name: Variable: WEBUI_PASSWORD
Config.Description: Password for web UI authentication.

Config.Name: Variable: API_KEY
Config.Description: API key for slskd API access, string between 16 and 255 characters.

Config.Name: Variable: REMOTE_CONFIGURATION
Config.Description: Allow remote configuration (true/false).

Config.Name: Variable: REMOTE_FILE_MANAGEMENT
Config.Description: Allow remote file management (true/false).

Config.Name: Variable: GLUETUN_INCOMING_PORT
Config.Description: Specify whether to attempt to identify and configure the applications listening port when connected to the gluetun network.

Config.Name: Variable: GLUETUN_CONTROL_SERVER_PORT
Config.Description: Specify the port for the gluetun HTTP Control Server.

Config.Name: Variable: GLUETUN_CONTROL_SERVER_USERNAME
Config.Description: Specify the username for the gluetun HTTP Control Server

Config.Name: Variable: GLUETUN_CONTROL_SERVER_PASSWORD
Config.Description: Specify the password for the gluetun HTTP Control Server

Config.Name: Variable: ENABLE_HEALTHCHECK
Config.Description: Enable or disable healthchecks.

Config.Name: Variable: HEALTHCHECK_COMMAND
Config.Description: The command or script to execute, if not specified then the script healthcheck.sh will be used (process, dns and https checking).

Config.Name: Variable: HEALTHCHECK_ACTION
Config.Description: The action to execute if the healthcheck command returns a non zero exit code, if not specified the action will be 'exit 1', if you want the container to exit on failure then set the action to 'kill 1'.

Config.Name: Variable: HEALTHCHECK_HOSTNAME
Config.Description: The hostname used when performing HTTPS and DNS healthchecking.

Config.Name: Variable: PUID
Config.Description: User ID for the running container

Config.Name: Variable: PGID
Config.Description: Group ID for the running container

Config.Name: Variable: UMASK
Config.Description: UMASK for the running container
